QuestData.Title: Retest Now
QuestData.Description: This should do the trick!$b$bThose twisted hooligans are looking for souls to put in their crazy-juice? Then I say we help 'em out a bit!$b$bTake a swig of this - don't worry, I've diluted it plenty... I'm almost positive that its only effect will be to detect any cultist's essence once you've defeated them.$b$bWhen you've collected a bunch of them, throw the writhing mass of twisted souls into any of their cauldrons.$b$bLet's see how they like a taste of their own medicine!
QuestData.LogDescription: Chief Engineer Boltwrench aboard the Skybreaker wants you to throw a Writhing Mass into a cauldron at Aldur'thar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, $c?$b$bWe have a few less cultists to worry about?
